MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA4 postcode area of Warrington, affecting properties in Poachers Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.44am. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate the loss of power and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.53AM on 22nd November 2020.
